Articles.Content: When will there be a good hover mod that lets your ships hover? No im not talking about Kerbal Foundries. Will there be a mod that will be just like Kerbal Foundries that does work for 64x and wont destroy my saved builds or my saved games? Please let me know. If you are the maker of a mod that makes hover parts please PM me the mod and I will love you forever. Thank you and have a nice day.![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

MechJeb can do VTOL-type hovering using engines, as can [Throttle-controlled Avionics](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/107802)

If you want something like the hover wheels from Kerbal Foundries, but you don't like Kerbal Foundries, then you have to tell us what you want different.

Well basicly. All I really need is the hovering parts for my WIP builds but I don't want them crashing and destroying the save builds or saved game. A Mech suit mod would also be nice.

Also not to sound greedy but when will there be a mod that adds guns for kerbals? Just wondering.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-03-11T22:23:48Z" title="03/11/2015 10:23  PM" data-short="9 yr">March 11, 2015</time> by Specialist290**
  
Merging sequential posts by the same user.

warODST10175, I think it's premature to immediately announce that Kerbal Foundaries is the direct cause of your problems. We've noted you've had problems with KF in the past and will try to help with whatever we can, but don't expect an easy or immediate fix.

I am not personally aware of any alternatives to Kerbal Foundaries that provide the hovering devices that you specifically seek.

Also, please only post one add-on request per thread. This helps keep discussions streamlined, instead of people jumping back and forth between requests.
